item.title: Dirks Help thread
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

You can’t make npc’s wear items. It’s built into their graphics and
cannot be modified without the same software that jagex has.

Read full topic

item.title: Dirks Help thread
item.dc:creator: @dirk dirk
item.description:
@dirk wrote:

Cant change them i dont think. It is a very hard question :S. I have tried this myself before but couldnt figure out. Sorry :S

Read full topic

item.description:

ive been working all night trying to figure out how npcs can wear items,ive look in the most common files first but then i look throught them all i need to know how to make npcs where things is there some program and things to do i see it on several servers.

item.title: Dirks Help thread
item.dc:creator: @metalus89 metalus89
item.description:
@metalus89 wrote:

bobby, u just open their character file and go to rights and set it at 1 for admin, 2 for mod, and 3 for owner.
